list.description: I've been wanting to convert the original illustrations I drew into SVG files and apply them to a custom scope, but I don't know how. So I drew each line with a line, but it was very difficult. Is there a good way?

Sylphy sighting on all tanks
#anime #anime #animegirls #mushoku_tensei #mushokutensei #Sylphy

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download the Zip file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the UserSights folder (if it doesn't exist, create it, and then in it ‘all_tanks’) and move the unzipped file to the All_Tanks folder.
3. Start the game, go to Settings > General combat settings > Sight settings. Repeat several times, selecting tanks in the hangar in turn, to set the sight on each tank.
4. Enjoy!

If you don't have the UserSights folder displayed in the root folder of...

#semihistorical #semi_historical #semihistoric #m1 #m1a1 #m1a1hc #m1a1aim #m1ip #ipm1 #m1a2 #m1a2sep #m1a2sepv2 #abrams #modern #m60 #m60a3tts #mbt #fcs

BMP-3 or BMD-4 Artillery Sight

Capable indirect-fire sight with an elevation indicator to show angle difference between scope and cannon barrel of the BMP-3 /BMD-4 vehicles to get a feel for obstacles (tested with the shell "3OF70", shell type should not influence the elevation indicator angle)

  • ranges up to supported 5800 meters
  • elevation indicator
  • center clear circle to pinpoint fire
  • further customizable in the new system for night vision or thermal

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Download the Zip file and unzip it.
2. Go to the root folder of the game, find the UserSights folder (if it doesn't exist, create it, and then in it ‘all_tanks’) and move the unzipped file to the All_Tanks folder.
3. Start the game, go to Settings > General combat settings > Sight settings. Repeat several times, selecting tanks in the hangar in turn, to set the sight on each tank.
4. Enjoy!

#is2 #is_2 #is2_1944 #is_2_1944 #is21944

#germantank #german #ww2related

Disclaimer!: I am not the creator of these sights, im reposting since i can no longer find the original. If you the actually creator or you are the creator please let me know

These sights work specifically for ww2 German tanks like the Tiger 2, Tiger 1, and Panther

Simply add these to the UserSights folder in the game files, if there isnt one, make it and title it "UserSights"

As of the Dance of Dragons update these still work

Ill try to answer any questions, if im instructed to take this down i will

SEMI HISTORICAL ABRAMS SIGHT (TESTING)
Tested on 1080p only

This is primarily a test to get familiar with the new sight editor, but also update the M1 Abrams sight.

Kates_TV_TIS_SH is for the Abrams models with 3.0-10.0x magnification.
Kates_TV_MTIS_SH is for the Abrams models with 3.0-13.0x magnification.

#usa #sight #semihistorical #abrams

#collimator #sight #109 #190
Folder with assault sights and standard fighter.
I wrote the instructions on the sight itself

I combined 3 things in the sight:
1) Angle of attack
2) Aircraft speed
3) Distance to target

#################
09.19.24Obnukha angle of attack markings from Junkers on glass for FW-190

#################
09.20 So I set up the "grid" for focus

10.29 added a "video of how the bombsight works"

#anime #yurucamp #shimarin
There are 2 versions of the sight in the folder (the normal size and the smaller size for tanks with high optical zoom)


How to install:

  1. Extract the .zip file.
  2. Put 2 .blk files in "WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks"

СИЛЬНЫЙ прицел от СИЛЬНОГО стримера https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKJlgXG9Lc9jtr1IM97ANDA.
Прицел STRONG_sight_alt отлично подойдет сторонникам минимализма, которые играют на машинах со слабой и средней кратностью прицела. Альтернатива прицелу STRONG_sight, используя который отметки и значения могли накладываться друг на друга (вопрос к разработчикам). Рекомендую загрузить оба прицела и использовать как взаимозаменяемые.
Файл из папки распаковать в WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks

Update 2-14-25: Reformatted to use BiCubic MipMaps without error/gamma correction. This will provide superior clarity, especially on lower resolutions.

Made on a request. Gun and rocket sight for the Saab SK60 and 105g/oe. Due to a bug, the gyroscopic collimator only moves when NO rockets are selected. The sight will be stationary when ANY rockets are selected. YOU MAY ALSO USE HALF ROCKETS AND A GUNPOD. There are 3 separate sights: 2x 30mm, 1x 30mm and M/56D, and M/56D.

2.39 READY
Simple realistic sight for M1 Abrams series.

How to install and use:
1. Download .zip archive with sight
2. Unpack archive in War Thunder folder. Ensure you have file DD_M1_TIS_reticle_v2.blk in War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks and file DD_M1_Abrams_TIS.blk in War Thunder\UserSights\tank_sight_presets
3. Refresh sights (Alt+F9) or simply restart the game
4. Go to Settings>Main parameters>Ground vehicle Battle Settings and click "Sight settings" button.
5. In the top-left corner select desired tank in the drop down menus
6. ...

当前版本：2.39.0.14这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.
